ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle.mapper

Interface ContinuousPropertyMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertyMapperLocation, PropertyMapperRandom, PropertyMapperScore

    public interface ContinuousPropertyMapper

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float propertyValue(Feature f)
      Used to map some specific property of a Feature to a float value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0

    • Field Detail

      • INVALID

        static final float INVALID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • propertyValue

        float propertyValue(Feature f)
        Used to map some specific property of a Feature to a float value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0
        Parameters:
        f - The feature to extract the property for.
        Returns:
        A float value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0, or INVALID if the feature property maps to no value.
